= Email-to-Phone End User Setup Guide =

You can download and use Email-to-Phone project as is. The following are setup instructions:

  * [DownloadGateway Download and install Voicent Gateway]
  * [DownloadEmailToPhone Download and install EmailToPhone]
  * [SetupEmailToPhone Setup Email-to-Phone]
  * [CheckEmailByPhone Check email by phone]
  * [SetupEmailToPhoneTrigger Setup email to phone trigger]

If you are a developer, please see [DeveloperGuide Email to Phone Developer Guide]
